Posts.Content: Hi Claire, I had similar side effects as you, and it seemed to take 7-8 days to start feeling ‘normal’ again.  When I saw my oncologist I told her how I felt afterwards and she adjusted the anti sickness medication and the steroids so I was as bad the with the 2nd cycle.  I also started the constipation medication 2 days before the 2nd cycle.  I’ve just completed my 4th cycle and feel very tired but can function all be it slowly !!  I hope you start feeling human again soon xx
Posts.Title: First EC down but proper fed up
